TextView.android:text: Barlingmascakeb is a regional management which is oriented towards regional marketing in the southwest region of central java including 5 districts there are banjarnegara, purbalingga, banyumas, cilacap, and kebumen.

Based on a joint decree of the regent of banjarnegara, purbalingga, banyumas, cilacap, and kebumen number 130, a year 2003, number 4 year 2003, number 36 year 2003, number 48 year 2003, number 16 year 2003, the regional management institute for regional development barlingmascakeb was formed which oriented towards regional marketing.

Based on shared perceptions and willingness to obtain benefits, especially in the economic field, it is hoped that barlingmascakeb will become the leading institution capable of building regional economic foundations through activities that are the driving force for economic growth in the barlingmascakeb region. Through the spirit of togetherness between autonomous regions with the principles of interests and goals to build and develop the potential of each region, the establishment of barlingmascakeb is expected to be a solution to face the challenges and demands of a more competitive future.
